project_name: Porn projects, under the La Metta Hood
design_philosophy: Minimalist, natural, elegant, accessible, visually balanced.

aesthetic_direction.overall: Clean and sophisticated, inspired by natural textures and organic forms. Avoids overt or gratuitous visual clutter.

color_palette.primary: #1A2A3A (Deep Midnight Blue) - Evokes depth, trust, and sophistication.
color_palette.secondary: #E0D8C8 (Soft Sandstone) - Provides a warm, grounding, and natural contrast.
color_palette.accent: #8BC34A (Muted Sage Green) - Adds a touch of organic vitality and visual interest.
color_palette.neutral: #F5F5F5 (Clean Off-White) - For backgrounds and primary text, ensuring readability.
color_palette.text: #333333 (Charcoal Gray) - High contrast for readability against neutral backgrounds.

heading_font.usage: For main titles and key headings, conveying a strong yet refined presence.

body_font.usage: For all body text, ensuring high readability and a clean, modern feel.

typography.accessibility_notes: Sufficient contrast ratios will be maintained between text and background colors. Font sizes will be adjustable and legible across various devices.

ui_elements.layout: Generous use of white space, asymmetrical balance inspired by natural compositions (e.g., artful asymmetry in a forest canopy). Grid-based for structure, but with organic flow between sections.

navigation.style: Minimalist header with subtle hover effects. Possibly a 'hamburger' menu for mobile, designed to feel like a natural unfolding.
navigation.icons: Clean, line-based icons with a natural, organic feel.

buttons.style: Subtle gradients or soft shadows to provide depth without being overpowering. Rounded corners for a softer, more approachable feel.

states.default: Solid background with clear hover indication.
states.hover: Slightly lighter/darker shade or subtle glow.

forms.fields: Clean input fields with clear labels, subtle focus states, and appropriate validation feedback.
forms.style: Understated, allowing content to remain the focus.

imagery.style: High-quality, artfully composed imagery that aligns with the natural and elegant aesthetic. Focus on mood and suggestion rather than explicit display.

user_flow_principles: Intuitive navigation and clear calls to action.
Progressive disclosure of information to avoid overwhelming the user.
Focus on content discoverability through thoughtful categorization and search.
accessibility_considerations: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance as a minimum standard.
Keyboard navigability for all interactive elements.
Sufficient color contrast for text and UI elements.
Alt text for all meaningful images.
Responsive design for all screen sizes.

brand_cohesion.logo_concept: A stylized, abstract representation of a natural element (e.g., a subtle leaf vein, a gentle wave) integrated with a minimalist 'LM' or 'Porn Projects' initial. Clean lines, minimal color, and a sense of understated sophistication.
thematic_elements: Subtle use of organic patterns in backgrounds or dividers.
Smooth animations and transitions that mimic natural movements.
Emphasis on high-quality, evocative content presentation.
